<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="774190f01f1310005a3637b8ec8b70ef" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_needit</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>NeedIt When needed field date</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// NeedIt Propertiesテーブルから事前通知日数プロパティ値を取得
	var daysLeadTime = GlideApplicationProperty.getValue('x_58872_needit.advancedNoticeDays');

	// 計算に必要な値をdaysLeadTimeで調整
	// getDisplayValueでu_when_neededの表示値を取得
	var whenNeeded = new GlideDateTime(current.u_when_needed.getDisplayValue());
	// 取得した時刻をシステム時刻(UTC)に変換し、daysLeadTimeを使い日数を計算。
	whenNeeded.addDaysUTC(-daysLeadTime);
	var comparisonDate = whenNeeded.getDate();

	// スクリプトインクルードのNeedItUtilsクラスをインスタンス化
	// その中にあるisDatePastメソッドを呼び出し、u_when_needed値を渡す
	var niutils = new NeedItUtils();
	var isPast = niutils.isDatePast(comparisonDate);

	// isDatePastメソッドがtrueを返す場合は過去の日付
	if(isPast == true) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(
			"When needed date needs to be more than" + 
			daysLeadTime + 
			"from today. Your request has not been savae to the datavase.");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-06 00:56:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>774190f01f1310005a3637b8ec8b70ef</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3714d61283fb42108f37cb29feaad3ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedIt When needed field date</sys_name><sys_overrides display_value="">9373668d4fd93200cb281b818110c7f9</sys_overrides><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3714d61283fb42108f37cb29feaad3ea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-06 00:56:37</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3714d61283fb42108f37cb29feaad3ea"/></record_update>
